name: NAO6 Robot (Enhanced ROS2 Integration)
description: Comprehensive NAO6 robot integration for HRIStudio experiments via ROS2. Provides full robot control including movement, speech synthesis, posture control, sensor monitoring, and safety features. Optimized for human-robot interaction research with production-ready reliability.

robotIp.title: Robot IP Address
robotIp.description: IP address or hostname of the NAO6 robot

websocketUrl.title: WebSocket URL
websocketUrl.description: ROS bridge WebSocket URL for robot communication

maxLinearVelocity.title: Max Linear Velocity (m/s)
maxLinearVelocity.description: Maximum allowed linear movement speed for safety

maxAngularVelocity.title: Max Angular Velocity (rad/s)
maxAngularVelocity.description: Maximum allowed rotational speed for safety

defaultMovementSpeed.title: Default Movement Speed
defaultMovementSpeed.description: Speed factor for posture and gesture movements (0.1-1.0)

enableSafetyMonitoring.title: Enable Safety Monitoring
enableSafetyMonitoring.description: Enable automatic safety monitoring and emergency stops

autoWakeUp.title: Auto Wake-up Robot
autoWakeUp.description: Automatically wake up robot when experiment starts

monitorBattery.title: Monitor Battery
monitorBattery.description: Monitor robot battery level during experiments

actionDefinitions.name: Speak Text
actionDefinitions.description: Make the NAO robot speak the specified text using text-to-speech synthesis

text.title: Text to Speak
text.description: The text that the robot should speak aloud

waitForCompletion.title: Wait for Speech to Complete
waitForCompletion.description: Wait until speech finishes before continuing to next action

actionDefinitions.name: Move Robot
actionDefinitions.description: Move the NAO robot with specified linear and angular velocities

distance.title: Distance/Angle
distance.description: Distance in meters for linear movement, or angle in degrees for rotation

speed.title: Movement Speed
speed.description: Speed factor (0.1 = very slow, 1.0 = normal speed)

duration.title: Duration (seconds)
duration.description: How long to maintain the movement

linear.x: {{#eq direction 'forward'}}{{multiply distance speed 0.1}}{{/eq}}{{#eq direction 'backward'}}{{multiply distance speed -0.1}}{{/eq}}{{#eq direction 'custom'}}{{customX}}{{/eq}}{{#default}}0.0{{/default}}
linear.y: {{#eq direction 'left'}}{{multiply distance speed 0.1}}{{/eq}}{{#eq direction 'right'}}{{multiply distance speed -0.1}}{{/eq}}{{#eq direction 'custom'}}{{customY}}{{/eq}}{{#default}}0.0{{/default}}

angular.z: {{#eq direction 'turn_left'}}{{multiply distance speed 0.1}}{{/eq}}{{#eq direction 'turn_right'}}{{multiply distance speed -0.1}}{{/eq}}{{#eq direction 'custom'}}{{customTheta}}{{/eq}}{{#default}}0.0{{/default}}

actionDefinitions.name: Set Posture
actionDefinitions.description: Set the NAO robot to a specific posture or pose

speed.title: Movement Speed
speed.description: Speed of posture transition (0.1 = slow, 1.0 = fast)

waitForCompletion.title: Wait for Completion
waitForCompletion.description: Wait until posture change is complete before continuing

actionDefinitions.name: Move Head
actionDefinitions.description: Control NAO robot head movement for gaze direction and attention

speed.title: Movement Speed
speed.description: Speed of head movement (0.1 = slow, 1.0 = fast)

presetDirection.title: Preset Direction
presetDirection.description: Use preset head direction instead of custom angles

joint_angles: {{#ne presetDirection 'none'}}{{#eq presetDirection 'left'}}1.57{{/eq}}{{#eq presetDirection 'right'}}-1.57{{/eq}}{{#eq presetDirection 'center'}}0.0{{/eq}}{{#eq presetDirection 'look_left'}}0.78{{/eq}}{{#eq presetDirection 'look_right'}}-0.78{{/eq}}{{#default}}{{multiply headYaw 0.0175}}{{/default}}{{/ne}}{{#eq presetDirection 'none'}}{{multiply headYaw 0.0175}}{{/eq}}

{{#ne presetDirection 'none'}}{{#eq presetDirection 'up'}}0.44{{/eq}}{{#eq presetDirection 'down'}}-0.44{{/eq}}{{#eq presetDirection 'center'}}0.0{{/eq}}{{#default}}{{multiply headPitch 0.0175}}{{/default}}{{/ne}}{{#eq presetDirection 'none'}}{{multiply headPitch 0.0175}}{{/eq}}

actionDefinitions.name: Perform Gesture
actionDefinitions.description: Make NAO robot perform predefined gestures and animations

gesture.title: Gesture Type
gesture.description: Select a predefined gesture or animation

intensity.title: Gesture Intensity
intensity.description: Intensity of the gesture movement (0.5 = subtle, 1.0 = full)

speed.title: Gesture Speed
speed.description: Speed of gesture execution (0.1 = slow, 1.0 = fast)

repeatCount.title: Repeat Count
repeatCount.description: Number of times to repeat the gesture

requestMapping.data: {{#eq gesture 'wave'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1{{/eq}}{{#eq gesture 'point_left'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/YouKnowWhat_1{{/eq}}{{#eq gesture 'point_right'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/YouKnowWhat_2{{/eq}}{{#eq gesture 'applause'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/Applause_1{{/eq}}{{#eq gesture 'thumbs_up'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/Yes_1{{/eq}}{{#eq gesture 'open_arms'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/Everything_1{{/eq}}{{#eq gesture 'bow'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/BowShort_1{{/eq}}{{#eq gesture 'celebration'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/Excited_1{{/eq}}{{#eq gesture 'thinking'}}animations/Stand/Gestures/Thinking_1{{/eq}}

actionDefinitions.name: Control LEDs
actionDefinitions.description: Control NAO robot LED colors and patterns for visual feedback

intensity.title: LED Intensity
intensity.description: Brightness of the LEDs (0.0 = off, 1.0 = maximum)

duration.title: Duration (seconds)
duration.description: How long to maintain the LED state (0 = indefinite)

actionDefinitions.name: Monitor Sensors
actionDefinitions.description: Monitor NAO robot sensors for interaction detection and environmental awareness

duration.title: Monitoring Duration (seconds)
duration.description: How long to monitor sensors (0 = continuous)

sensitivity.title: Detection Sensitivity
sensitivity.description: Sensitivity level for sensor detection (0.1 = low, 1.0 = high)

logEvents.title: Log Sensor Events
logEvents.description: Log all sensor events to experiment data

triggerAction.title: Trigger Action
triggerAction.description: Action to take when sensor is activated

actionDefinitions.name: Emergency Stop
actionDefinitions.description: Immediately stop all robot movement and animations for safety

stopType.title: Stop Type
stopType.description: Type of emergency stop to perform

safePosture.title: Move to Safe Posture
safePosture.description: Automatically move to a safe posture after stopping

actionDefinitions.name: Wake Up / Rest Robot
actionDefinitions.description: Wake up the robot or put it to rest position for power management

action.title: Action
action.description: Wake up robot or put to rest

waitForCompletion.title: Wait for Completion
waitForCompletion.description: Wait until wake/rest action is complete

actionDefinitions.name: Check Robot Status
actionDefinitions.description: Get current robot status including battery, temperature, and system health

logToExperiment.title: Log to Experiment Data
logToExperiment.description: Save status information to experiment logs

setup.command: ros2 launch nao_launch nao6_production.launch.py nao_ip:=nao.local password:=robolab

setup.description_detail: Set WebSocket URL to ws://localhost:9090 in plugin configuration

commonIssues.solution: Ensure robot is awake. Use 'Wake Up / Rest Robot' action or press chest button for 3 seconds.
Check that rosbridge is running: ros2 node list | grep rosbridge. Restart if needed.
Adjust maxLinearVelocity and maxAngularVelocity in plugin configuration.
Check robot volume settings and ensure speech synthesis service is active.

safetyNotes: Always ensure clear space around robot during movement
Use Emergency Stop action if robot behaves unexpectedly
Monitor battery level during long experiments
Start with slow movements to test robot response
Keep robot on stable, level surfaces

examples.name: Basic Greeting Interaction
examples.description: Simple greeting sequence with speech and gesture

examples.name: Attention and Pointing
examples.description: Direct attention using head movement and pointing

examples.name: Interactive Sensor Monitoring
examples.description: Monitor for touch interactions and respond

parameters.text: Touch my head when you're ready to continue.
